entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale east to northeasterlies gusting 120km/h. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Watch area expanded to include Marlborough about and south of Richmond Range, also removed Canterbury High Country south of Lake Sumner.
